Typealiases.html#/s:16StreamChatClient13.name: TokenProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:16StreamChatClient13.abstract: A token provider is a function in which you send a request to your own backend to get a Stream Chat API token.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: extraDataType
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: A custom extra data type for users.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: isOnline
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: An indicator if a user is online.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: isInvisible
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: An indicator if a user is invisible.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: isBanned
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: An indicator if a user was banned.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: teams
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: Teams the user belongs to. You need to enable multi-tenancy if you want to use this, else it’ll be empty.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: isCurrent
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: Check if the user is the current user.

Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.name: canBeMuted
Structs/User.html#/s:16StreamChatClient4.abstract: Checks if the user can be muted.

Structs/MutedUser.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: init(user:created:updated:)
Structs/MutedUser.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: Create a muted user for a database.

Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: inviteAccepted
Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: A date when an invited was accepted.

Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: inviteRejected
Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: A date when an invited was rejected.

Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: isCurrent
Structs/Member.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Checks if the member is the current user.

Structs/SearchQuery.html#/s:16StreamChat.name: pagination
Structs/SearchQuery.html#/s:16StreamChat.abstract: A pagination. It works via the standard limit and offset parameters.

Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: state
Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: A query will return a channel state, e.g. messages.

Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: watch
Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Listen for a channel changes in real time, e.g. a new message evevnt.

Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: presence
Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Get updates when the user goes offline/online.

Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: all
Structs/QueryOptions.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Includes all query options: state, watch and presence.

Structs/Reaction.html#/s:16StreamChatCli.name: extraDataType
Structs/Reaction.html#/s:16StreamChatCli.abstract: A custom extra data type for reactions.

Structs/Reaction.html#/s:16StreamChatCli.name: isOwn
Structs/Reaction.html#/s:16StreamChatCli.abstract: Check if the reaction is from the current user.

Structs/MessageRead.html#/s:16StreamChat.name: lastReadDate
Structs/MessageRead.html#/s:16StreamChat.abstract: A last read date by the user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: extraDataType
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: A custom extra data type for messages.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: showReplyInChannel
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if this reply message needs to show in the channel.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isSilent
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Flag for silent messages. Silent messages won’t increase the unread count. See https://getstream.io/chat/docs/silent_messages/?language=swift

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isEphemeral
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message is ephemeral, e.g. Giphy preview.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isOwn
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message is own message of the current user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isReply
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message is a reply.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: canEdit
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message could be edited.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: canDelete
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message could be deleted.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: textOrArgs
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: A combination of message text and command args.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isBan
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Returns true if the message is type of error with a text for the banned user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: hasOwnReaction(type:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check if the message has a reaction with the given type from the current user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: addOrUpdate(reaction:toOwnReactions:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Add a given reaction to the current user own reactions.

Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: delete(reaction:fromOwnReactions:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Delete a given reaction from the current user own reaction.

Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:16Stre.name: isCancelled
Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:16Stre.abstract: Check if the action is cancel button.

Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:16Stre.name: isSend
Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:16Stre.abstract: Check if the action is send button.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: isImage

Structs/Attachment/ActionStyle.html.name: ActionStyle
Structs/Attachment/ActionStyle.html.abstract: An attachment action style, e.g. primary button.

Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: messagesLimit
Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: A number of messages inside each channel.

Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: id
Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: An hash id for filter and sorting properties.

Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: membersPagination
Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: A pagination for members (see Pagination). You can use .limit and .offset.

Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: watchersPagination
Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: A pagination for watchers (see Pagination). You can use .limit and .offset.

Structs/MessageResponse.html#/s:16Stream.name: channel
Structs/MessageResponse.html#/s:16Stream.abstract: Owner channel of this message. Only available when a message is queried by its id.

Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:16StreamC.name: buffer
Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: No progress is possible or there was not enough room in the output buffer.

Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:16StreamC.name: version
Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: The zlib library version is incompatible with the version assumed by the caller.

Structs/GzipError.html.name: GzipError
Structs/GzipError.html.abstract: Errors on gzipping/gunzipping based on the zlib error codes.

Structs/ChannelExtraData.html.name: ChannelExtraData
Structs/ChannelExtraData.html.abstract: A default channel extra data type with name and imageURL properties.

Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient19Chan.name: ChannelInviteAnswer
Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient19Chan.abstract: An answer for an invite to a channel.

Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient21Chan.name: ChannelInviteResponse
Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient21Chan.abstract: An answer for an invite to a channel.

Structs/MessageRead.html.name: MessageRead
Structs/MessageRead.html.abstract: A message read state. User + last read date + unread message count.

Structs/UnreadCount.html.name: UnreadCount
Structs/UnreadCount.html.abstract: An unread counts of the current user.

Structs/UsersResponse.html.name: UsersResponse
Structs/UsersResponse.html.abstract: A response with a list of users.

Structs/UpdatedUsersResponse.html.name: UpdatedUsersResponse
Structs/UpdatedUsersResponse.html.abstract: A response with a list of users by id.

Structs/DevicesResponse.html.name: DevicesResponse
Structs/DevicesResponse.html.abstract: A response with a list of devices.

Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7UserB.name: UserBan
Structs.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7UserB.abstract: A request object to ban a user.

Structs/UserExtraData.html.name: UserExtraData
Structs/UserExtraData.html.abstract: A default user extra data type with name and avatarURL properties.

Structs/NestedKey.html.name: NestedKey
Structs/NestedKey.html.abstract: Use this to annotate the properties that require a depth traversal during decoding.

Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: sendImage(data:fileName:mimeType:channel:progress:completion:)
Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Uploads an image with a given data from the camera.

Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: sendFile(data:fileName:mimeType:channel:progress:completion:)
Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Uploads a file with a given local file.

Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: deleteFile(url:channel:_:)
Protocols/Uploader.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Delete a file with a given URL.

Protocols/ChannelNamingStrategy.html#/s:.name: extraData(for:members:)
Protocols/ChannelNamingStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Returns a channel extra data with default name and image based on the current user and members.

Protocols/Database.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Fetch channels and messages from a database.

Protocols/Database.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: addToDatabase(messages:to:)
Protocols/Database.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Add messages to a channel. The channel and members should be added/updated too.

Protocols/Database.html#/s:16StreamChatC.name: addToDatabase(members:for:)
Protocols/Database.html#/s:16StreamChatC.abstract: Add a new member for a channel.

Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: cancel()
Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: Cancel the underlying subscription for this object.

Protocols/Cancellable.html.name: Cancellable
Protocols/Cancellable.html.abstract: Reference for the subscription initiated. Call cancel() to end subscription.

Protocols.html#/s:16StreamChatClient15Au.name: AutoCancellable
Protocols.html#/s:16StreamChatClient15Au.abstract: Reference for the subscription initiated. Call cancel() to end the subscription.

Protocols/ChannelExtraDataCodable.html.name: ChannelExtraDataCodable
Protocols/ChannelExtraDataCodable.html.abstract: A channel extra data protocol for custom channel properties.

Protocols/ChannelNamingStrategy.html.name: ChannelNamingStrategy
Protocols/ChannelNamingStrategy.html.abstract: Describes a way to get the default channel name and image with an empty channel id and a list of members.

Protocols/UserExtraDataCodable.html.name: UserExtraDataCodable
Protocols/UserExtraDataCodable.html.abstract: A user extra data protocol for custom user properties.

Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient8doB.name: doBefore(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient8doB.abstract: Performs side effect work for a success result before of the original completion block.

Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7doA.name: doAfter(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7doA.abstract: Performs side effect work for a success result after of the original completion block.

Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient2do3.name: do(for:doBefore:doAfter:)
Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient2do3.abstract: Performs side effect work for a success result before and after of the original completion block.

Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7onE.name: onError(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:16StreamChatClient7onE.abstract: Performs side effect work for a failure result before of the original completion block.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16StreamChat.name: probablyHasURL
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16StreamChat.abstract: Checks if the string probably has an URL, e.g. “ab.io”, “a7.io”

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: error

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: isSuccess
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Returns true if the result was success.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: map(to:)

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: map(_:)

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: catchError(_:)
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Catches an error in the result and send it to the error handler to map it to a success result.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: first(orError:)
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Map values from the result to the first value. If array is empty, will map to an error.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: compactMap(to:)
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Returns an array containing the non-nil results of calling the given transformation with each element of this sequence.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: compactMap(_:)
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Returns an array containing the non-nil results of calling the given transformation with each element of this sequence.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.name: forEach(_:)
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO16Str.abstract: Calls the given closure on each element in the sequence in the same order as a for-in loop.

Enums/ConnectionState.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: connecting
Enums/ConnectionState.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: The websocket was connected, waiting for a connectionId for requests.

Enums/ConnectionState.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: disconnected(_:)

Enums/ConnectionState.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: isConnected
Enums/ConnectionState.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: Checks if the connection state is connected.

Enums/PaginationOption.html#/s:16StreamC.name: channelsNextPageSize

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: connectionChanged
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When the state of the connection changed.

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: healthCheck

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: A pong event.

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a user presence changed, e.g. online, offline, away (when subscribed to the user presence).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: userUpdated

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: userBanned
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a user was banned (when subscribed to the user presence).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: userStartWatching

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: userStopWatching

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: typingStop

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: channelUpdated
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a channel was updated (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: channelDeleted
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a channel was deleted (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: channelHidden
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a channel was hidden (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: messageNew
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a new message was added on a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: messageUpdated
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a message was updated (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: messageDeleted
Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: When a message was deleted (when watching the channel).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: messageRead

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: memberUpdated

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: memberRemoved

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: reactionNew

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: reactionUpdated

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: reactionDeleted

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: notificationAddedToChannel

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: notificationInviteAccepted

Enums/EventType.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: notificationInviteRejected

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: A pong event.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: userPresenceChanged(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user presence changed, e.g. online, offline, away (when subscribed to the user presence).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: userUpdated(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user was updated (when subscribed to the user presence).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: userBanned(reason:expiration:created:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user was banned (when subscribed to the user presence).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: userStartWatching(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user starts watching a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: userStopWatching(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user stops watching a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: typingStart(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: Sent when a user starts typing (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: typingStop(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: Sent when a user stops typing (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: channelUpdated(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a channel was updated (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: channelDeleted(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a channel was deleted (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: channelHidden(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a channel was hidden (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: messageNew(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a new message was added on a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: messageUpdated(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a message was updated (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: messageDeleted(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a message was deleted (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: messageRead(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a channel was marked as read (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: memberAdded(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a member was added to a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: memberUpdated(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a member was updated (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: memberRemoved(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a member was removed from a channel (when watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: reactionNew(_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a message reaction was added.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: reactionUpdated(_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a message reaction updated.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: reactionDeleted(_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a message reaction deleted.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationMessageNew(_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a new message was added on a channel (when clients that are not currently watching the channel).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationMarkRead(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the count of unread messages changed for the channel where the user is a member.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationMarkAllRead(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the total count of unread messages (across all channels the user is a member) changed

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationMutesUpdated(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the user mutes someone.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationAddedToChannel(_:_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the user accepts an invite (when the user invited).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationRemovedFromChannel(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When a user was removed from a channel (when the user invited).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationInvited(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the user was invited to join a channel (when the user invited).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationInviteAccepted(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the user accepts an invite (when the user invited).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: notificationInviteRejected(_:_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: When the user reject an invite (when the user invited).

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: type
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: An event type.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: cid
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: A cid from the event.

Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.name: user
Enums/Event.html#/s:16StreamChatClient5E.abstract: A user from the event.

Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: rawValue
Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: A raw value of the channel type.

Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: init(rawValue:)
Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: Init a channel type with a string raw value.

Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: enabledForModerators(timeoutInMinutes:reason:)
Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: Enabled for channel members with a role of moderator or admin.

Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: timeoutInMinutes
Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: The default timeout in minutes until the ban is automatically expired.

Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: reason
Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: The default reason the ban was created.

Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.name: isEnabled(for:)
Enums/BanEnabling.html#/s:16StreamChatCl.abstract: Returns true is the ban is enabled for the channel.

Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: addDevice(deviceId:_:)
Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Add a device with a given identifier for Push Notifications.

Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: removeDevice(deviceId:_:)
Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Remove a device with a given identifier.

Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: showChannel(_:_:)
Enums/Endpoint.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Show a channel if it was hidden.

Enums/InviteAnswer.html.name: InviteAnswer
Enums/InviteAnswer.html.abstract: An answer for an invite to join a channel.

Enums/MessageType.html.name: MessageType
Enums/MessageType.html.abstract: A message type, e.g. regular, ephemeral, reply.

Classes/InternetConnection/State.html#/s.name: unknown
Classes/InternetConnection/State.html#/s.abstract: Notification of an Internet connection has not begun.

Classes/InternetConnection.html#/s:16Str.name: OnStateChanged
Classes/InternetConnection.html#/s:16Str.abstract: A callback type of the Internet connection state.

Classes/InternetConnection.html#/s:16Str.name: onStateChanged
Classes/InternetConnection.html#/s:16Str.abstract: A callback of the Internet connection state.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: get(default:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Get the value if exists or return a default value.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: update(_:to:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Updates a sub value at the given keypath.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: append(to:_:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Adds an element to the end of the collection at the given keypath.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Accesses a sub value by the given keypath.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: init(callbackQueue:_:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Creates a new Atomic instance with the initial value of nil.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: get(default:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Returns the current value if not nil or returns the default value.
Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: reactionsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: If users are allowed to add reactions to messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: typingEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Controls if typing indicators are shown. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: readEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Controls whether the chat shows how far youve read. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: connectEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Determines if events are fired for connecting and disconnecting to a chat. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: repliesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Enables message threads and replies. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: searchEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Controls if messages should be searchable (this is a premium feature). Disabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: mutesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to mute other users. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: urlEnrichmentEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Determines if URL enrichment enabled to show they as attachments. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: flagsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to flag messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.name: messageRetention
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:16StreamC.abstract: A number of days or infinite. Infinite by default.

Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:16S.name: cid
Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:16S.abstract: A combination of channel id and type.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: extraDataType
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: A custom extra data type for channels.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: team
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: The team the channel belongs to. You need to enable multi-tenancy if you want to use this, else it’ll be nil.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: readEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Checks if read events evalable for the current user.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: unreadMessageRead
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Unread message state for the current user.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isUnread
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Checks if the current status of the channel is unread.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isDirectMessage
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Checks if the channel is direct message type between 2 users.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: onUpdate
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: An event when the channel was updated.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: didLoad
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Checks if the channel was decoded from a channel response.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isWatched
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Checks if the channel is watching by the client.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: isBanned(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Check is the user is banned for the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: startTypingEventTimeout
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: The number of seconds from the last typingStart event until the typingStop event is automatically sent.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: startTypingResendInterval
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: If user is still typing, resend the typingStart event after this time interval.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: query(messagesPagination:membersPagination:watchersPagination:options:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Request for a channel data, e.g. messages, members, read states, etc

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: watch(options:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Loads the initial channel state and watches for changes.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: stopWatching(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Stop watching the channel for a state changes.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: hide(clearHistory:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Hide the channel from queryChannels for the user until a message is added.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: show(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Removes the hidden status for a channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: send(message:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Send a new message or update with a given message.id.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: send(action:for:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Send a message action for a given ephemeral message.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: markRead(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Mark messages in the channel as read.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: keystroke(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Send a keystroke event for the current user.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: stopTyping(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Send a stop typing event for the current user.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: add(user:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Add a user as a member to the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: remove(user:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Remove a user as a member from the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: remove(users:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Remove users as members from the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: deleteImage(url:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Delete an image with a given URL.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.name: deleteFile(url:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:16StreamChatClie.abstract: Delete a file with a given URL.

Classes/ClientLogger/Options.html#/s:16S.name: logger(icon:for:)
Classes/ClientLogger/Options.html#/s:16S.abstract: Create a logger with intersected log options.

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: iconEnabled
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Controls whether to display icons in logs

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: dateEnabled
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Controls whether to display date in logs

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: levelEnabled
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Controls whether to display log level in logs

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: log(_:message:forceToShowData:)
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Log a data as a pretty printed JSON string.

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: logAssert(_:_:file:line:)
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Performs Swift.assert and stops program execution if condition evaluated to false. In RELEASE builds only

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.name: logAssertionFailure(_:file:line:)
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:16StreamCha.abstract: Triggers Swift.assertionFailure. In RELEASE builds only logs the failure.

Classes/SubscriptionBag.html#/s:16Stream.name: adding(_:)
Classes/SubscriptionBag.html#/s:16Stream.abstract: Add multiple subscriptions in a chain way.

Classes/SubscriptionBag.html#/s:16Stream.name: cancel()
Classes/SubscriptionBag.html#/s:16Stream.abstract: Cancel and clear all subscriptions in the bag.

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: callbackQueue
Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: A request callback queue, default nil (some background thread).

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:16StreamCh.name: stayConnectedInBackground
Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:16StreamCh.abstract: When the app will go to the background, start a background task to stay connected for 5 min.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: isExpiredTokenInProgress
Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Checks if the expired Token is updating.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: isConnected
Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Check if API key and token are valid and the web socket is connected.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: isWatching(channel:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Checks if the given channel is watching.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: A common way to init a channel with channel type and id.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.name: channel(type:members:team:extraData:namingStrategy:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: A channel with members without id. It’s great for direct message channels.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Request for a channel data, e.g. messages, members, read states, etc.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Requests for a channel data, e.g. messages, members, read states, etc.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Loads the initial channel state and watches for changes.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Stop watching the channel for a state changes.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Hide the channel from queryChannels for the user until a message is added.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Removes the hidden status for a channel.

Classes/Client.html#/s:16StreamChatClien.abstract: Send a new message or update with a given message.id.

Classes/SubscriptionBag.html.name: SubscriptionBag
Classes/SubscriptionBag.html.abstract: A subscription bag allows you collect multiple subscriptions and cancel them at once.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
